cast.name: 弗拉·亚伯拉罕 Farrah Abraham
查茜蒂·桑德斯 Chasity Saunders
杰里米亚·邓巴 Jerimiyah Dunbar

introduction: Best friends and old-school street hustlers Black and Blue went legit twenty years ago when they opened their family restaurant. But with the health inspector threatening to shut them down, they could lose it all. Now it's up to young scam artists Fatboy qiwan.cc and Spyda to step up and save the day. And a stolen shipment of the hottest smart phones might just be the ticket, so long as the cops and a couple of bloodthirsty gangs don't get them first. Come back and visit the old neighborhood in this hilarious all-new comedy classic even wilder than the original.
